So we've done a lot of Investments and what I would describe as early stage, is that are designed to address social problems many of them are nonprofits many of them are actually, you know, Abby Corporation or a for-profit or something in between and we've had some Google like outcomes where we that with an organization very very early, you know, an organization, you know, the organization with the budget a hundred thousand three hundred thousand and we give them three million at a very early stage of their development and that now they've become you know, organizations that really move the needle so I find that stuff very sort of A passionate about that kind of structure but you know in terms of what we focused on economic empowerment social justice addressing income inequality, you know, we've done some cancer research kind of backing kind of early sort of younger scientists before they can get grants from the NIH.
It's really been about backing very talented.

I would say entrepreneurs and people who are passionate about solving a problem with either a for-profit solution or a no For profit solution and I'm even more passionate about the for-profit solutions to a problem.
